pullrequest.title: Allow `gz log` to output to a file

content.raw: Comparing raw CDATA is not an accurate way to check if the log files are the same. The CDATA can contain multiple states, and the current log filtering will put one state in each chunk. The test included in this pull request checks exactly the situation you were manually testing.
content.html: Comparing raw CDATA is not an accurate way to check if the log files are the same. The CDATA can contain multiple states, and the current log filtering will put one state in each chunk. The test included in this pull request checks exactly the situation you were manually testing.
